PageHeader Component ​
A header component for displaying page titles, subtitles and action areas.
Complete Usage ​
Order
Edit
Hot
vue
<template>
>>>>>>> 9d5153c2e2dfa5da96cfe461ac74665107b5acf0
  <ImPageHeader title="Order" subTitle="Edit">
    <template #action>
      <ImButton color="primary">Save</ImButton>
    </template>
    <template #content>
      <ImTag color="primary">Hot</ImTag>
    </template>
  </ImPageHeader>
</template>

API ​
ImPageHeader Props ​
PropertyDescriptionTypeDefaultRequired
titleMain title textstring-Yes
subTitleSubtitle textstring-No
ImPageHeader Slots ​
SlotDescription
titleTitle Slot area
actionAction buttons area
contentAdditional content area
subTitleSub Title

API ​

ImPageHeader Props ​

PropertyDescriptionTypeDefaultRequired
titleMain title textstring-Yes
subTitleSubtitle textstring-No

ImPageHeader Slots ​

SlotDescription
titleTitle Slot area
actionAction buttons area
contentAdditional content area
subTitleSub Title
